title: food processor pasta dough
instructions: Pulse salt and flour in a food processor.
Add eggs and olive oil to bowl and process for 30â€“60 seconds.  The contents should come together into a large ball.
Once you have a ball, plop the dough onto a cutting board and knead until the ball is relatively smooth and soft.
Cover the dough with plastic wrap and let rest for 30 minutes.  Once rested it is ready to be rolled into whatever style pasta you'd like
notes: For a more decadent pasta, replace one whole egg with two yolks.
